name: InstantDiminish Anti-Aging Serum
description:
InstantDIMINISH is the strongest, most potent Anti-Aging serum on the market today!

The secret to understanding how InstantDIMINISH works so well is in the active ingredients. First, only the four most effective all-natural substances go into InstantDIMINISH. While there are other good active ingredients out there, these four when combined together, have a synergistic effect producing both short term and long term permanent results when used for a 3-6 month period. Now lets look at the active ingredients:

- 25% Acetyl Hexapeptide - 3 (AH3)
- 15% Palmitoyl Pentapeptide - 3 (PP3)
- 15% Gamma Aminobutyric Acid (GABA)
- 20% Hyaluronic Acid (Hyaluronon) (HA)

You get 4 powerful ingredients --- pumped into the serum at maximum levels --- that help you fight fine lines and wrinkles... get rid of age spots... firm up sagging skin... wipe away crows feet... give your skin a more radiant, plumper appearance and take years off your complexion.
So there you have it: InstantDIMINISH has virtually no fillers. Other products have between 2% and 20% active ingredients. InstantDIMINISH contains a full 75% of these amazing compounds.

InstantDIMINISH is also very affordable at just a fraction of the cost in comparison to plastic surgery and injections without the pain and recovery periods. Our product has permanent effects with continual use and when used on a regular basis, can actually delay and prevent new wrinkles from forming.
